title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 492 - Computation of the Fuel Use Tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 492 - Computation of the Fuel Use Tax

State Regulations
§ 492.1 - Determining the Composite Rate and Aggregate Rate of Tax

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 3, pt. 492

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 301-h[c], 509[7], 523[b], 528[a], [c]; art. 21-A;L. 2006, ch. 35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 492.1 - Determining the Composite Rate and Aggregate Rate of Tax
